metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in Skia in Google Chrome prior to 95.0.4638.54 alloweda remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
